document.full_text: an arab league summit originally planned for march this year has been delayed by 12 months at the request of its host, iraq, arab league secretary-general amr moussa told reuters on thursday.
document.title: arab league delays summit by year to march 2012
lines_and_colors: an arab league summit originally planned for march this year has been delayed by 12 months at the request of its host, iraq, arab league secretary-general amr moussa told reuters on thursday.
